::: {.question}

**Ownership and Debt Financing**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(webexercises)
library(knitr)
set.seed(607)
founders <- round(runif(1, 0.55, 0.80), 3)
seriesA  <- 1 - founders
D_m      <- round(runif(1, 3, 12), 3)
f_pct <- round(100*founders, 1)
a_pct <- round(100*seriesA, 1)
cat(sprintf("After Series A, founders own <b>%1.1f%%</b> and Series A investors own <b>%1.1f%%</b>.", 
            f_pct, a_pct))
cat(sprintf("<br>Then the company raises <b>R$ %1.3f million</b> via <b>debt</b> (no equity issued).", D_m))
```

What are the **final ownership percentages** for founders and Series A investors after the **debt** raise?

::: {.question-block}
